ygData.subject: Re: Fixing prices for new jewelry?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had great luck selling so far this morning. Selling the new mana bracelets for 20p each isn t a problem. Also, those plus two rings are like tailor made
ygData.messageBody:
I have had great luck selling so far this morning. Selling the new mana
bracelets for 20p each isn't a problem. Also, those plus two rings are
like tailor made for whoeevre needs what, and they sell quick now! Been
selling them for between 2 plat up to 6 plat. I sold CHA bracelets this
morning for 18plat for a pair plus one CHR necklace. (plus 11CHR total)
All in all, some great stuff! I was alsot able to sell a pair of AGI
Electrum rings for 16plat a pair. Basically just going by the double
price law seems to be working finally!


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chip Paul [SMTP:cpaul@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 1:24 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Fixing prices for new jewelry?
>
> From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
>
> Does anyone want to work together to make a price list for selling
> the new jewelry to players? Some of it is quite good, so we can
> probably get a decent amount for even the smaller stuff. I've seen
> jade rings (the old kind even) selling for up to 13p on some servers.
>
> http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest/ has the updated list of
> what the new jewelry makes after last nighs patch if you are
> interested.
>
> Kaela
>
> ----------------------------------------------------------------------
> --
> Got an opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
